Get around Viet Nam

Ha Noi

- FPT Aptech, DETECH Tower, No 8th, Ton That Thuyet, Nam Tu Liem, Hanoi





Da Nang

- Danang University of Technology, No 54th, Nguyen Luong Bang, Hoa Khanh Bac, Lien Chieu, Danang

- Duy Tan University, K7/25 Quang Trung, Hai Chau, Danang

- IViettech Center,92 Quang Trung, Thach Thang, Danang

Ho Chi Minh City

- Silicon Straits Saigon, 147 Ton Dat Tien, Tan Phong,HCM

- Axon Active Vietnam, Hai Au Building 10th Floor, 39B Truong Son Str., Ward 4, Tan Binh Dist,HCM

- Cho Tot, The 18th Floor, Me Linh Point Building, No 2 Ngo Duc Ke, Q1, HCM

- FabLab Saigon, 44/10 Nguyen Van Dau Street, Ward 6, Binh Thanh District, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
